name: key-vault-key-generation
description: Generates or imports a key to Key Vault
author: JamieTaffurelli

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to authenticate as

inputs.name: keyVaultName
inputs.label: Key Vault Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Key Vault you are deploying to

inputs.name: uploadType
inputs.label: Upload Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generate, import or restore from backup

inputs.name: keyName
inputs.label: Key Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the key to appear in Key Vault

inputs.name: KeySize
inputs.label: Key Size
inputs.helpMarkDown: The size in bits of the RSA key

inputs.name: Destination
inputs.label: Destination Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Place into Software or HSM for cryptography operations, HSM only valid for Premium Key Vault SKU

inputs.name: SetActivation
inputs.label: Set Activation Date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set an activation date for the key

inputs.name: ActivationDateType
inputs.label: Activation Date Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set a relative or specific activation date

inputs.name: ActivationDateHours
inputs.label: Hours
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of hours from agents time to set activation date

inputs.name: ActivationDateDays
inputs.label: Days
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of days from agents time to set activation date

inputs.name: ActivationDateMonths
inputs.label: Months
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of months from agents time to set activation date

inputs.name: ActivationDateYears
inputs.label: Years
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of years from agents time to set activation date

inputs.name: ActivationDateSpecific
inputs.label: Date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Date in ISO 8601 format

inputs.name: SetExpiration
inputs.label: Set Expiration Date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set an expiration date for the key

inputs.name: ExpirationDateType
inputs.label: Expiration Date Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set a relative or specific expiration date

inputs.name: ExpirationDateHours
inputs.label: Hours
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of hours from agents time to set expiration date

inputs.name: ExpirationDateDays
inputs.label: Days
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of days from agents time to set expiration date

inputs.name: ExpirationDateMonths
inputs.label: Months
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of months from agents time to set expiration date

inputs.name: ExpirationDateYears
inputs.label: Years
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of years from agents time to set expiration date

inputs.name: ExpirationDateSpecific
inputs.label: Date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Date in ISO 8601 format

inputs.name: keyFile
inputs.label: Key File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to file for importing or restoring backup

inputs.name: errorOnConflict
inputs.label: Error on Key Conflict
inputs.helpMarkDown: Return an error if key with same name already exists, write warning if false

OutputVariables.name: KEY_VERSION
OutputVariables.description: The version of the key placed into Key Vault
